products.title: Ascot Stripe White Roman Blind
products.description: The ultimate in graceful grandeur, the ascot striped roman blind in white will sit timelessly in any window. The cloth has an unusually silky quality, while being woven of fibres which trap air for maximum insulation. So, whether you choose to hang these blinds upstairs or down, you can be assured youre investing in a piece enriched with timeless style. products.title: Ascot Stripe Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Invest in the classic style of the ascot striped roman blind in ivory to add a classic expression to your room. Versatile around all your decorating needs, this strong stripe will add fresh lines in a glossy silken fabric. This is not only a design asset but it also acts as an excellent insulator for those chilly evenings.
